An example Twilio API call to send a SMS message.

tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM twilio.send_message
  WHERE mediaTypeExtension='.json'
  AND AccountSid='<Twillio Account SID>'		-- Get this from the home page of your Twilio account
  AND $body=(SELECT {
    'To' : '+15555555555',
    'From' : '+11235554567',					-- Your twilio phone number
    'Body' : 'This is your text message body!'
  })
